member.name: T:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper
member.summary: A wrapper object used for easy insertion to and retrieval from a MongoDB database.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty instance of the class.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.#ctor(GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The measurement to be wrapped by the wrapper.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.Adder
member.summary: The adder used to adjust the value of the measurement.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.ID
member.summary: The identification number of the measurement. PointIDs are unsigned integers, but MongoDB needs to store them as signed integers.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.Multiplier
member.summary: The multiplier used to adjust the value of the measurement.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.SignalID
member.summary: String representation of the measurement's signal ID.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.Source
member.summary: The source of the measurement.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.TagName
member.summary: The measurement's tag name.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.Timestamp
member.summary: The timestamp associated with the measurement.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.Value
member.summary: The value of the measurement, before applying the adder and multiplier.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MeasurementWrapper.GetMeasurement
member.summary: Returns a new measurement equivalent to the one being wrapped.

member.name: T:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an input adapter that reads measurements from a MongoDB database.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.DatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the MongoDB database.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.CollectionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the measurement collection.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.Server
member.summary: Gets or sets the server on which the MongoDB daemon is running.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port on which the MongoDB daemon is listening.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.FramesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the rate at which frames are sent to the concentrator.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.SimulateRealTime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether timestamps are simulated for real-time concentration.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Returns false; this adapter connects to MongoDB synchronously.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the using settings from the connection string.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to MongoDB.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from MongoDB.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoInputAdapter.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a short message describing the current status of the adapter.
member.param: The maximum length of the status message.

member.name: T:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an output adapter that archives measurements to a MongoDB database.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.DatabaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the MongoDB database.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.CollectionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the measurement collection.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.Server
member.summary: Gets or sets the server on which the MongoDB daemon is running.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port on which the MongoDB daemon is listening.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Returns true; the measurements are archived by this adapter into a MongoDB database.

member.name: P:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Returns false; this adapter connects to MongoDB synchronously.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the using settings from the connection string.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to MongoDB.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from MongoDB.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.ProcessMeasurements(GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement[])
member.summary: Stores a collection of measurements in the MongoDB database.
member.param: The measurements to be stored in the MongoDB database.

member.name: M:MongoAdapters.MongoOutputAdapter.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a short message describing the current status of the adapter.
member.param: The maximum length of the status message.
